selected_quotes: Good discussion of peer review problems: The world's oldest axe shows the cut and thrust of academia
In academia, people often have axes to grind--and they grind them very finely.
My colleague Peter Hiscock has some wise words on resiliance, the absurdity of publishing and the world's oldest axe
Be reflexive, self-critical... resilient: story of peer review of the world's oldest axe

citation.abstract: Getting a scientific paper published about a significant finding - like the discovery of the world's oldest axe - is challenge in itself.
